name: Chandigarh Intro – AI Competition Invite
subject: AI Competition Invite for {{school_name}}
content:
Hi {{contact_person}},

We organize fun, beginner-friendly competitions that help students build real-world projects.

We recently hosted a Startup Competition where students from {{school_name}} took part — and did really well. Now, we’re back with something new.

We’re hosting an online AI competition open to all students in {{city}}. It’s free, team-friendly, and doesn’t need coding skills. Students can use tools like Canva, ChatGPT, or anything they’re comfortable with.

Our last event saw 1000+ students across India. This time, we’re expecting even more.

Can I share a poster and signup link with you? Would love to see {{school_name}} represented again.

Best,  
Rishul Chanana  
Founder, Maximally  
📞 +91-9041260790  
🌐 maximally.in
